sections.purpose: To outline the procedure for operating the High Performance Liquid Chromatography system.
sections.scope: Applicable to analysis carried out in the Pharmaceutics laboratory.
procedure: Switch ON the HPLC system and associated modules.
Prime the pump with mobile phase.
Set chromatographic conditions in the software.
After analysis, flush the system with suitable solvent.
sections.precautions: Ensure mobile phase is free from air bubbles. Do not exceed pressure limits.
